name: First Name
quote: If this persona had one or two sentences to say about him/herself and the work he/she does, what would it be?
keys-to-success: What are the most important things this persona is trying to accomplish?
It might also be appropriate to mention a primary motivation here as well.
Include key area(s) of support needed from other personas
dangers: What obstacles does this persona encounter that obscure their Keys to Success?
What obstacles exist that the persona may not even know about, but will cause trouble in the future?
What are some things that must never happen, or that this persona must never do?

day-in-the-life.summary: Include a quick summary of the most commons activities to accomplish the goals.
